#include<stdio.h>
#include<cstdlib>
struct node
{
    int a,b;
};
int compare (const void * a, const void * b)
{
  return ( (*((struct node *)a)).b - (*((struct node *)b)).b );
}
struct node time[1000002];
int main()
{
    int test_cases,c;
    scanf("%d",&test_cases);
    int count,last_end;
    for(int i=0;i<test_cases;i++)
    {
        count=0;
        scanf("%d",&c);
        for(int j=0;j<c;j++)
            scanf("%d%d",&(time[j].a),&(time[j].b));
        qsort(time,c,sizeof(struct node),compare);
        count=1;
        last_end=time[0].b;
        for(int j=1;j<c;j++)
        {
            if(time[j].a>=last_end)
            {
                count++;
                last_end=time[j].b;
            }
        }
        printf("%d\n",count);
    }
}
